KnowledgeBase.Title: run
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: object-oriented object closure record save file system

Function.Description: The run function loads and evaluates the specified AIS Lisp source file with the specified filename.

Brief.Overview: The run function loads and evaluates the specified AIS Lisp source file with the specified filename {filename}.
Brief.Usage: The run function opens an existing AIS Lisp source file and evaluates it.

Argument.Name: filename
Argument.Note: The name of the AIS Lisp source file to be opened and evaluated. This name may include a full path specification.

Syntax.Return: The last value of the last Lisp expression in the evaluated Lisp source file, filename, is returned
